name: Letter Toss
description:
STORY:
You are working in a letter sorting facility. Your job is to put leters to the corresponding bins depending on the FLAG thats on the letter and the bin. One day u notice that somone started putting instructions on the REVERSE side of the letters. When you follow them, the next day you get money for "your troubles".

GOAL OF THE GAME:
The goal of the game is to survive 5 minutes sorting letters while balancing getting money (the postal servic doesnt pay that well so you need som extra cash) and not getting fired (it would be nice to keep the job).

HOW TO PLAY:
-Drag and drop letters using the left mouse key
-Flip letters to their reversed side by clicking on them with the right mouse key
-Drop good letters to the bin with the same flag in order to get "Good job" points (left top corner bar)
-Drop bad letters in the trash (swipe them down to the edge)
-Putting a bad letter in a bin, or a good in the trash or a good letter into the wrong bin subtracts "Good job" points
-To recieve money follow instructions on the back of the letter, but be aware bacause if you do you will lose "Good job" points
-If u lose all "Good job" points you get fired and lose the game

HOW TO DESTINGUISH GOOD LETTERS FROM BAD LETTERS?:
Any of these sympthoms make a bad letter:
-scribles in the sender and recipient fields (chaotic lines)
-a torn post stamp
A good letter has all of those signs:
-almost straight lines in the sender and recipient fields (kind of like waves)
-the post stamp is not thorn
